title: BRING BACK THE SILENCE ON TALON
body:
Talon was a well played champion back in the day but why did you remove his silence. I was a talon main when I first started and read on the Internet that he ha a silence before. Pleasee bring his silence back for all talon mains and to combat OP zed.

-Wjchoi,  a sad talon main

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yggcKLJf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-22T04:14:10.015+0000)
>
> 1. Zed is balanced.

###WTF ARE YOU THINKING M8 THERE IS NOTHING BALANCED ABOUT ZED
They removed a lot of silences from the game, Talon is fine how he is. I am also expecting them to remove Cho'gath's silence.
Replace it with what? As it stands now if you miss your void spikes as Cho'Gath the only other way to disengage is his Silence.
Ya, Cho relies heavily on his w. Although so many silences have been removed I wouldn't be surprised if they remve his or just change it slightly.

Reduce the duration of the silence, maybe. Cho'gath's CC is pretty strong if he lands his void spikes since the slow afterwards is incredibly strong, but I really don't think they're going to remove his silence at all, Cho'Gath needs it and it would too much of a nerf if they did.
I agree, for an AoE silence it does last awfully long. (2.5 seconds at max rank if I remember correct)
